name: PicsDL
tagline: Tired of spending 10 minutes each time you want to retrieve pictures from your camera? With PicsDL, you just plug your device, and... done!
body:
# Downloads

![Windows 8 icon](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/master/website/resources/1442431092_Windows_Phone.png)  | [**Windows Installer v0.6.2**](https://github.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/releases/download/0.6.2/PicsDL_Setup_0.6.2.1684.exe) 
------------- | -------------

# PicsDL - Pictures Downloader
![PicsDL](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/master/PicsDL/PicsDL128.png)

## Screenshot
![screenshot of PicsDL downloading Pictures from a memory card](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/master/website/resources/PicsDL-screenshot-downloading.png)

##Main features:

* Retrieves pictures and videos from any type of device (camera, smartphone, memory card, USB stick, External Hard Drive).
* All-automatic mode: simply plug the device and watch your pictures being downloaded and organised.
* Organize and rename your files based on date/time and EXIF tags (such as camera brand/name, etc.)
* Geo-tag the pictures
* Free-up space on your device
* Available in English ![English](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/master/PicsDL/resources/flag_en.png) and in French ![French](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clement-nardi/pics-dl/master/PicsDL/resources/flag_fr.png)
* Reorganize a folder
* Geotag some pictures
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
